answer.response: Please check our website for real-time updates on arrival and departure of your flight for today and tomorrow.
For a new booking, we recommend passengers visit the online booking portal of their preferred airlines to complete their booking process.
Hello, Passengers are requested to contact their concerned airlines to cancel their flight booking as they are the appropriate authority to handle the cancellation process.
Hello, Passengers are requested to contact their concerned airlines to reschedule their flight bookings as they are the appropriate authority to handle the rescheduling process.
Hello, Passengers are requested to contact their concerned airlines for name correction on their flight bookings as they are the appropriate authority to handle the name correction process.
Kempegowda International Airport, KIAL Rd, Devanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560300
Yes, we have an overnight parking facility; for four-wheelers, it will be INR 600 for the first day (24hrs) and every additional day INR 350 (24hrs). P4 is the zone, and the slot is available 24/7.
Yes, we have an overnight parking facility; for Two-wheelers, it will be INR250 for the first day(24hrs) and every additional day INR 150(24hrs).

A dedicated drop off and pick up point is provided in the lane closest to the terminal for people with reduced mobility and those requiring wheelchair facility.n
Reduced Mobility n
Location: P4 Zone
Duration:Fare
0 to 30 minutes: ₹ 100
Every additional 1 hour:₹ 50
One day:₹ 600
Every additional day:₹ 350
Loss of ticket:₹ 600

Bus Parking below 16 seater
Location: P4 Zone
Duration:0 to 1 hours
Fare: ₹200
Additional hours:₹200
Loss of ticket:₹1000

Bus Parking above 16 seater
Location: P4 Zone
Duration:0 to 1 hours
Fare : ₹500
Additional hours:₹500
Loss of ticket:₹1000

Hello, Airport buses/shuttle services to and from the airport are handled by BMTC. They have a separate helpdesk at the airport; please reach out to them on 080 22952522/2422 or 07760991269 for enquires.
Hello, for fly Bus Services, please contact 09972213726 for more information, and you can also visit their website www.ksrtc.in for more information.
Car Rental services booking services are available at Arrivals Kerbside.You may contact the following service providers: WTI Cabs : +91-8884449775, Carz on Rent : +91-9972502292

The Airport Taxi service is easily accessible from the Arrival Zone. Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website

Signage for app-based taxis will guide passengers and visitors to the taxi boarding area, which is a short walk from the Terminal. The Uber boarding point is opposite Arrivals, while the Ola boarding point is next to the BMTC bus station.

Pink Taxi by KSTDC and BLRAirport is an initiative for women passengers to travel to and from the Airport. Available 24X7, the taxis are equipped with safety features such as GPRS tracking and an SOS switch for your safety. Fare: 06:00 hours to 23:59 hours - 21.50 per km 00:01 hours to 05:59 hours - 23.50 per km

Passengers can avail the shuttle service from the Airport Halt Station to reach various parts of BLR Airport.
The shuttle service is synchronised with the train timings.
Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website
The movement of cyclists at the BLR Airport campus was restricted due to safety concerns. Please contact our team at 9538884433 for further details.

Avail free Wi-Fi service (upto 45 minutes) at BLR Airport with a simple log-in process.

  1. Enable Wi-Fi and select BLR Airport free Wi-Fi.
  2. Open a web browser on your device and type any URL. You will be redirected to the Wi-Fi webpage.
  3. Fill in the required details and click on 'send OTP'
  4. Enter the OTP received and click on 'submit'.
  5. Enjoy free internet for 45 minutes. Do not close the login page during this duration.
  6. Passengers may also avail paid Wi-Fi at nominal rates.
Baggage wrap service is available at the check-in hall near vestibule 1.
ATM's are available at both Departure and Arrival Zones in addtion to the kerbside
Multiple baby care facilities are available across domestic and international zones. Please follow the signages or contact our ground staff.
Hello, the domestic BLR lounge is located inside the terminal building after the security check, managed by TFS(Travel and Food Services). You may reach out to them on - 8657541678/ 080-46577100
Hello, the International BLR lounge is located inside the terminal building after the security check, managed by TFS(Travel and Food Services). You may reach out to them on - 8657541675/ 080-46577150

Passengers may enter the lounge only three hours before departure time and are permitted to spend three hours on a single transaction. If a passenger wants to extend the duration, they need to approach the reception with their requirements.

Both lounges (domestic + international) are operational round-the-clock at BLR Airport.
Passengers can access the lounge using eligible lounge cards like VISA, Mastercard, RuPay, Diners club, American Express, Lounge Key, Lounge Club, Priority Pass and Airline invitation cards.

Post COVID-19, the lounges offer live food counters for dining, as well as takeaway food box options.
The cuisine on offer includes a mix of Indian and Continental food, along with beverages.
The lounges offer a variety of liquor options at an additional charge.

Hi, I'm Eko, Your Virtual Assistant at Bengaluru Airport. Pleased to be serving you today.
Please click a button below, or enter your question and I will do my best to help you.
Hey there!
Thank you! Glad to be of service.

We have charging point alloted at the kerb side opposite to Subway outlet.
In Departure Hall it is readily accessible at the airport
We have 'Care by BLR' paid porter Service available 24/7 at the airport for baggage assistance. You can contact them on 080-66787505
We do have Post Office counter in the arrival area which is operational 09:00 hrs to 17:00 hrs.
Self-check-in kiosks, which allow passengers to print/ re-print boarding passes or baggage tags, are available at the Terminal. For any additional requirements, please reach out to the Airline staff.

Aster Medical Centre – adjacent to the Terminal building east side
Aster Medical Clinic – 1st floor next to Forex counter

Duty Medical officer (Medical Centre) – 97397 33335
Duty Medical officer (Aster PTB clinic) - 91487 90154
The clinic is located at the Arrival level of T2
There is a free calling facility at Arrival Immigration and Domestic Security Hold Area (SHA)
Passengers are requested to contact their respective airline for the detailed procedure. Please click here for the contact details of our airline partners.

With over 44 F&B outlets, operational round the clock, BLR Airport has both Indian and International gourmet cuisines on offer.
Passengers and visitors have the option to explore the variety of restaurants at the Kerb and The Quad by BLR, as well.
Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website

Once past security check, Tiffin Express in the Domestic boarding gates area (near Gate #2 and Gate #23) offers vegetarian food.
Besides, there are several outlets on the Kerb and at The Quad by BLR serving only vegetarian food, such as Aubree, Bharatiya Jalpan, Nandi Upachar, Ooru Canteen, among others.
Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website

There are several outlets at The Quad by BLR that serve alcohol, including Barley & Grapes Café and Windmills Brewery. Alcohol is available between 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM. In addition, Living Liquidz and La Cave sell a selection of liquor and wine.
Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website

Passengers can pre-order their meals through the website, self-ordering FSTR kiosks or by scanning the QR code displayed across the Terminal, with an option to have it delivered at a location of choice at the Terminal, including a specific boarding gate.
Please check the website to place your order
See On Website
The Food outlets are operational round the clock

1. Carry your e-ticket or get your e-boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.
  2. Ensure that you have a valid government photo ID for security verification.
  3. Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage. Use self-bag drop, if applicable.
  4. Show your e-boarding pass to CISF Personnel to pass-through security check.

1. Carry your e-ticket or get your boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.
  2. Ensure that you have a Passport and valid visa.
  3. Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage.
  4. All passengers are required to clear Immigration and have their passports stamped during both arrival and departure.
  5. Show your e-boarding pass to CISF Personnel to pass-through security check.

Self-check-in kiosks are located at the Kerb, near Departure Gate #1.
The passenger must scan the barcode on the ticket, select a seat and retrieve the e-boarding pass.
Hello, Passengers can carry up to 5 litres of liquor in their check-in luggage only.
Passengers can carry up to 5 litres of liquor in their check-in luggage only.
Hello, As per the BCAS (Bureau of Civil Aviation Security) E-Cigarettes are not allowed to carry in the flights

International travellers can carry upto Rs.25000 Indian currency.
There is no limit on carrying foreign currency purchased from authorised foreign exchange dealers.

For differently abled passengers, a dedicated zone is reserved for drop-off at the Kerb near the Departure gates and pick up at the inner Kerb near Arrivals. A calling facility has been installed at the drop-off point to enable passengers to call the airline for assistance. Differently abled passengers are accorded priority at all processing points (departure gates, check-in counters, PESC and boarding gates). Passengers with reduced mobility can opt for the complimentary buggy service available at two designated locations: near Departure gates and at International security check area. Passengers can also engage a concierge and porter service. They will be assisted by staff and escorted by the porter to the check-in counter.
We do have Domestic to Domestic Transfers. But they are only open morning 07:00 Hrs to 10:00 Hrs and evening 16:00 Hrs to 19:00 Hrs.
Boarding gates for all flights close 25 minutes before departure.

Passengers (above the age of 18 years) are allowed the following items free of Customs duty.
  1. One laptop
  2. Two litres of alcoholic beverage
  3. 100 cigarettes / 25 cigars / 125 grams of tobacco.
    Please check our website for more information on this topic.
    See On Website
A transfer gate is located between the Arrival Hall and the Departure area (the entrance next to the Arrival lounge exit). Please get in touch with airline / Terminal staff for assistance.
Visitors are not allowed inside the Terminal as per the Bureau of Civil Aviation Security (BCAS) directive.

Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website

Any Government-issued, original photo Identity proof are accepted.
Example: Passport, Aadhar card, Driving license, Voter ID, Pan card etc.
The Digi-locker & M-Aadhar (Mobile App) facility can also be availed by passengers as document proof.

A separate queue for domestic travelers with Reduced Mobility (PRM) and Senior Citizens is available at the security check area.
Queue 4 is restricted for Domestic Passengers with Reduced Mobility (PRM) and Senior Citizens
A dedicated premium queue for domestic business-class passengers is available.

A maximum of 100 ml of liquid, per container, are allowed in hand baggage.
Sanitizer upto 350 ml is allowed in the COVID-19 scenario.
Milk Powder is allowed in hand luggage for the infants under special needs
For the rules on taking musical instruments and sports equipment, please contact your airline for baggage policies.

For medicines please carry your prescription.
If you have prostheses or other devices, we suggest you bring the relevant documents with you and notify the CISF Personnel before going through the security check.
Taking both empty plastic bottles and solid food is allowed in the airport, subject to the import rules of the country of origin/destination.

Please check our website for more information on this topic.
See On Website
As per airline policy, you should report 2 hours before departure time for domestic flights as counters closes 60 minutes before departure time. Please get in touch with your airline at 080-22012001

Most airlines require that passengers report at check-in counters three hours before departure for international flights.
Please check with your airline for updates.

1. Carry your e-ticket or get your e-boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.
  2. Ensure that you have a valid government photo Identity Proof for security verification.
Hello, passengers can print their boarding passes from the kiosk machines placed outside and inside the terminal building.
Passengers will get printed bill with a line item of Rs. 95/- as toll charges in all Airport Taxis. For app-based taxi services, passengers are requested to verify directly with the service.

International travel passengers departing from Bengaluru are requested to connect with their respective Airlines as the country's regulations determine the guidelines. The airline staff will verify the documents inside the airport at the time of check-in. Further, do visit the airline's website for more updated information.

As per the GoI circular dated February 10, 2022, below are the revised international guidelines, effective February 14, 2022. BEFORE TRAVEL- Submit self-declaration form on Air Suvidha portal www.newdelhiairport.in, including travel details of last 14 days. Upload a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR report; test conducted within 72 hrs prior to the journey OR upload a certificate of completing full primary vaccination schedule of COVID-19 vaccination. The list of countries which have an agreement with India on mutual recognition of vaccination certificates are available on www.mohfw.gov.in. Passengers must give an undertaking on the portal or otherwise to the MoCA (GoI) through the Airline that they would abide by the decisions of the appropriate Govt authorities to undergo self-health monitoring/quarantine, as warranted. ARRIVAL AT BLR AIRPORT-Undergo Thermal screening. Show the online self-declaration form to the Airport Health Officials. 2% of the passengers will undergo random testing at BLR Airport. Such passengers will be identified by the Airlines. They will submit swab samples and exit the airport. All international passengers arriving in Bengaluru must self-monitor their health for 14 days. If they develop any symptoms of COVID-19, they must self-isolate and inform the nearest health facility or call the National/State Helpline number. Children under 5 years are exempted from both pre and post arrival testing.

State governments have announced various protocols for arriving passengers. Please check with your airline about state-specific guidelines before you fly. For updated information click on the links below.
Indigo: www.goindigo.in
SpiceJet: www.spicejet.com
AirAsia: airasia.co.in
Air Vistara: www.airvistara.com
GoAir: www.flygofirst.com
StarAir: www.starair.in
Trujet: www.trujet.com

As per the GoK circular dated February 17, 2022  passengers arriving from Maharashtra, Goa and Kerala, should display two doses of COVID-19 vaccination certificate. Negative RT-PCR report is not required.
As per the DGCA circular dated March 8, 2022, all scheduled international commercial international passenger flight services to and from India will resume from March 27, 2022.

Contactless Wi-Fi coupon dispensing kiosks are placed at International arrivals. Steps to follow:

  • Scan the photo page of your passport.
  • Scan your boarding pass.
  • Accept terms & conditions.
  • Collect your Wi-Fi voucher code.

Please contact: Ministry of Health Family Welfare’s.
24X7 helpline +91-11-2397804
or
email: ncov2019@gmail.com
Books and magazines are available at Relay outlets located on SHA, Arrival Hall, and the kerb (temporarily closed due to renovation).
The pram service has been discontinued due to COVID-19.
Your query is related to the customs department; I request you to contact them on Departure - 080 22001404

Inner lane vehicle access, buggy service, wheelchair access by airline, designated seating area, priority entry from check-in to boarding and designated restrooms. Tactile flooring is also available for passengers with visual disability.

If you have any queries or suggestions, or wish to tell us about your experience at Kempegowda International Airport, Bengaluru, please get in touch with us.

WhatsApp +91-8884998888

Phone 080-22012001

E-Mail ID feedback@bialairport.com
This reward program is designed to thank & reward loyal customers for purchasing products at select merchants at the airport. See more on website please click here

Anyone above the age of 18 years, who travels via Bangalore International airport can join the Rewards program.
The passenger can download the BIAL Application or visit the website via link sent in earn SMS to join the program. The customer need to select the check box “Enroll me into the Bangalore Airport Loyalty Program” while registering in the BIAL Application or in website.
There is no cost associated to become a member of the Reward Program.

Members who are part of the reward program will receive 2 points for every 100 INR spent for every transactions on selected merchants at BIAL airport. Additionally, points may be issued from time to time based on promotional activities run by the merchants.

Member will be provided an option to “pay with points” in the EDC machine while purchasing products from participating brands at the airport. The Member will be provided “pay with points” option while purchasing through BIAL application as well.
Members will be able to redeem only 50% of point balance in wallet during each transaction.
Points will expire 24 months from the date they were first earned. If member does not redeem Points within this time frame, member forfeits all such Points.
Members can view their point balance by signing in the BIAL application. The Member has to select “My wallet” under Profile section to view the wallet balance.

Members can view the points earned/ redeemed against each transaction by signing in the BIAL app.
Member will have to select “My wallet” from “Profile section”. Under Wallet section, members will be able to see points earned/ redeemed during each transaction in Points Passbook

Points earned for the transaction will be removed in the event that a purchase is returned for a refund.
Points redeemed for the transaction will be added to the member’s points wallet during refund.
Points earned through the reward program have no cash value and are non-transferable.
Searching for parking spots can be exhausting. Let our experienced valet driver park your car safely and securely. Your car, our responsibility. See on website please click here
Celebrate your special moments with elegantly wrapped bouquet of beautiful fresh flower. It will bring a delightful welcome to your dear ones. click here

Treat your car to a little grooming at the airport. We use only quality cleaning products to care for your vehicle. We will take care of those stubborn stains and unreachable spots. Let your car shine with eco-friendly hand wash service with minimal use of water. Save water & pamper your car. See on website please click here
We are happy to help you with your heavy luggages. Make your journey seamless, safe & comfortable by availing our Porter service. See on website please click here
Before you meet the world, we look forward to meeting and assist you. Our Meet & Assist service makes sure that your experience on arrival be seamless & pleasant. See on website please click here
Before you meet the world, we look forward to meeting and assist you. Our Meet & Assist service makes sure that your experience on transit be seamless & pleasant. See on website please click here

Our Care by BLR- Experience Counter offers Baggage wrapping service to the passengers departing from Kempegowda International Airport, Bangaluru. Secure all your essential baggage by using our Baggage Wrapping services to shield against scratches, bumps, tampering and bad weather. Your Luggage is wrapped in a clear white environment friendly plastic film wrap which acts as a protective layer, securing and preventing the goods being damaged. See on website please click here
Start your journey in the lap of luxurious limousine car. This ride guarantees a safe, pleasant, and prompt drive to or from the airport. See on website please click here

The following domestic flights currently operate from T2:->

  • AirAsia India
  • Star Air
  • Vistara
  • Air India
Domestic flights will operate from T2 effective August 31, 2023, 00:01am. Click here for the flight schedule. Download the BLR Pulse App for flight schedules, Estimated queue wait times and more.

At T1, complimentary shuttle services are available from two points. The inner VIP lane at T1 Departure Zone next to Relay outlet T1 kerbside (near Arrivals) before Aster Clinic At T2, complimentary shuttle services are available from pick-up points P16 / P17 at the Arrivals Zone. There are prominent signages in these areas. Please follow them or contact our ground staff.
Hello, Please share your complete details, and we will share them with our operation team for review on your enquiry. Further, they will contact you only if the proposal deems feasible.
Please find the details as below.
Please select Source & Destination.
Please find the details as below.
Your query is related to the immigration department; I request you to contact them on Departure - 080 22001311 and Arrival - 080 22001315.
Hello, You may reach out to the concerned airlines on 080-66785555 / 080-47406666 for assistance with your ticket booking.
Hello, 'Aster' pharmacy & medical clinic is located on level 1 inside the terminal building. You can reach out to the departure/arrival virtual helpdesk for assistance.
Hello, We have a room facility available for departure in the terminal building managed by the 080 Transit hotel. You may reach out to them on -8951398241/ 080-66787373

Domestic operations from T2 commenced on January 15, 2023. Currently AirAsia India, Star Air and Vistara operate their domestic flights from T2. From 10:45 am on August 31, 2023, all scheduled International arrivals and departures will be from T2. Air India domestic flights will operate from T2 effective August 31, 2023, 00:01am.
Customers can contact BLR Airport at +91-8884998888 (WhatsApp only) and +91-80-22012001 / For airline related queries, please visit our airline partner

On Google maps or on BluSmart, OLA or Uber, select Terminal 2, Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru. Once inside the Airport campus you may also look for the directional signage.Click here for a detailed video on how to get to Terminal 2. Click here for a detailed video on how to get to Terminal 2.
This detailed video provides an understanding of the exit routes for various modes of transport.

The following modes of transport are available from T2: Airport Taxis BLuSmart, OLA and Uber BMTC buses* KSRTC buses** Private cars **KSRTC - Drop-off and pick-up are from the existing BMTC / KSRTC Zone at T1. **BMTC - Drop-off and pick-up are from Lane 2 at the Arrivals Zone in T2. Complimentary shuttle services are available to commute between T1 and T2.
Complimentary inter terminal shuttle services operate every 10 minutes. Travel time to transfer between the two terminals is approximately 10 minutes.

At T1, complimentary shuttle services are available from two points. The inner VIP lane at T1 Departure Zone next to Relay outlet T1 kerbside (near Arrivals) before Aster Clinic At T2, complimentary shuttle services are available from pick-up points P16 / P17 at the Arrivals Zone. There are prominent signages in these areas. Please follow them or contact our ground staff.

Kindly check your airline ticket or web check-in document for details on the terminal number. Customers can contact BLR Airport at +91-8884998888 (WhatsApp only) and +91-80-22012001.
Download the BLR Pulse App for flight schedules, estimated queue wait times and more.

To transfer to a different terminal, complimentary inter terminal shuttle service is available every 10 minutes. Pickup Point at T1 The inner VIP lane at the Departure Zone next to Relay outlet T1 kerbside (near Arrivals) before Aster Clinic Pickup Point at T2 P16 / P17 at the Arrivals level Please contact our team for assistance. For information on Transfers please click here.
For Intra terminal transfers (within the same terminal) please follow the signages or speak to our ground staff for assistance. Click here for the transfer processes.

To transfer to a different terminal, complimentary inter terminal shuttle service is available every 10 minutes. Please contact ground staff for assistance. It takes approximately 10 minutes to travel between the two terminals on the inter terminal complimentary shuttle bus.
Shower facility is available at the Lounges at departures and arrivals
The closest car parking facility is at the Arrivals level of T2. Please follow directional signages or speak to a traffic warden for assistance.
This facility is currently not available at T2 and will be launched shortly
Departures: Drop-off is at the inner departure lane / Arrival: Pick-up is next to the airport shuttle pick-up/ drop-off point (P16/P17).
Currently no post box is available at T2
This facility is currently not available at T2 and will be launched shortly
Please approach our customer service kiosks for sunflower merchandise
Currently there are no hotel counters at T2. Kindly note Taj Bangalore is located within the Airport campus. For reservations please call +91-8066003013 / +91-8066003014
We have two service providers handling post-paid taxi service at the airport WTi cabs: 8884449775 and Carzonrent Rental: 080 66783710/11.
Hello, We suggest all the passengers carry their original government-issued ID. Alternatively, you can also download the Digi-locker or M-Aadhar, accepted at BLR airport.

Domestic travel passengers departing from Bengaluru are requested to connect with their respective Airlines as the guidelines are determined by the destination states regulation; the airline staff will verify the documents inside the airport at check-in.  Further, do visit the airline's website for more updated information.
Carzonrent and WTi Cabs operate car rental services at BLR Airport. For information,

All scheduled International flights will arrive and depart from T2 effective 10:45 am on August 31, 2023.
Click here for the flight schedule or contact our Customer engagement centre for assistance on 080-22012001/080-66785555.
Basic medications against prescription will be available at the clinic
You can receive updates about your flight through mobile notifications or email alerts, which can be sent directly to your mobile device or inbox.

You can download the personalized digital travel buddy from the Google Play Store if you have an Android device or from the App Store if you have an iOS device. Simply search for the app and follow the installation instructions.
The features of the personalized digital travel buddy may vary depending on the specific app, but common features include flight tracking, itinerary management, airport maps, and travel tips.
Starting from 12th September 2023, at 10:45 am, all international flights will operate from Terminal 2, and domestic flights will operate from Terminal 1 at Bengaluru airport.
The first international flight arriving at Terminal 2 of BLR Airport is operated by Saudi Airlines.
The elevated walkway at BLR Airport serves to connect Terminal 1 to P4 Parking and provides passengers with a convenient means of access.
The elevated walkway measures 420 meters in length, making it a significant addition to the airport's infrastructure.

BLR Pulse is a service that allows passengers to pre-order meals at BLR Airport and collect them conveniently while on the go. Passengers can inquire about the types of meals available and how to place orders.
Information about whether pre-ordering meals with BLR Pulse is available for domestic and international flights can be found by visiting the provided link or contacting the airport.

The Aircraft Recovery Training School is a collaboration between BIAL and KUNZ GmbH, aimed at providing training in aircraft recovery techniques to aviation professionals.
Professionals will receive essential skills and training related to swift and safe aircraft recovery, ensuring smooth airport operations and passenger safety in the event of an incident.
Information about eligibility and participant criteria for the training programs can be obtained from the school or relevant authorities.
The training school's availability to aviation professionals from countries outside South Asia can be confirmed through official announcements or the school's communication channels.
Information about potential expansions or additional training locations may be available through official announcements from BIAL and KUNZ GmbH.
Aviation professionals and organizations interested in the training programs can inquire about enrollment procedures and program details through the school's official communication channels.
Interested parties can obtain more information about the Aircraft Recovery Training School by visiting BIAL's official website or contacting relevant authorities for details.
The Estimated Queue Time feature on BLR Pulse is designed to help travelers plan their journey to the airport by providing real-time information on queue lengths at various airport checkpoints
Information about the availability of the Estimated Queue Time feature for domestic and international travelers can be useful for all passengers.
Passengers may want to know if they need to enable location services or any other settings on their devices for the Estimated Queue Time feature to work optimally.
Knowing the frequency of updates for queue time estimates can help travelers plan their journey more effectively.
Travelers might inquire about whether the feature continues to provide queue time estimates once they are within the airport.

Parking is available at the Arrivals level of T2. Follow directional signages and instructions of our traffic wardens. T2 has P2 parking.
For T1 parking, please take the 2nd right and then take 1st left from T1 departure drop off exit. T1 has p4 parking.
